skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sterling b. worldwide radio
des: Sterling B Worldwide Radio plays the best of the best in Caribbean Gospel Music 24/7/365 as well as other genres of Gospel Music at its best all day long. Great preaching and motivational programs. Listen to The Gospel Reflection Show live with Shepherd Dr. Sterling B as he uplifts your mind, body, soul, and spirt. We play gospel music for the entire family.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
